summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 CHEVROLET TAHOE. WHILE DRIVING 60 MPH, THE ENGINE AND STEERING WHEEL SEIZED. THE VEHICLE WAS ABLE TO RESTART AND BE DRIVEN TO THE CONTACT'S HOME. ONCE THE CONTACT ARRIVED HOME, THE VEHICLE WAS UNABLE TO RESTART. DAVIS CHEVROLET (2277 S LOOP W, HOUSTON, TX 77054) WAS CONTACTED AND STATED THAT THE EXTENDED WARRANTY ON THE VEHICLE EXPIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 80,000.
